name: All Nighter Setting Spray Jumbo
ingredients: Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat., PVP, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Phenylpropanol, Propanediol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum/Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Maltodextrin, Poloxamer 407, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After completing your makeup look, shake the bottle well..-Hold the bottle eight to ten inches away from your face and mist two to four times in an
formation..-Want extra-intense, long-lasting eye color with less fallout? Wet your eyeshadow brush with All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray before you apply.

reviews.review_title: My Makeup is Stuck Like a Bad Relationship
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a lot of setting sprays in my time—some made my face feel like a grease trap, others left me looking like I’d just jumped into a pool (without the fun of swimming). But this one? It’s like a force field for my face.   First of all, let’s talk about the sprayer. I’ve never felt so pampered by something that wasn’t a spa day.   Now, for the magic: my makeup stays put. All day. ALL DAY. I went to a wedding, had a few awkward moments with the in-laws, and ended up at a bar where someone spilled a drink on me. My face? Unscathed. Meanwhile, my friend’s makeup was sliding off like it was auditioning for a role in a horror movie.   By the time I got home, I expected to look like a sad, melted version of myself, but nope. My makeup was still as intact as it was when I first applied it. I might actually start using this as a metaphor for commitment. My makeup and I are in this together, no matter how many times I accidentally rub my face on my sleeve. Or forget I used liquid blush and give my white shirt wearing boyfriend a hug.  If you’re looking for a setting spray that holds your face like it’s got a restraining order against sweat, THIS IS IT. My makeup’s got a better chance of surviving a zombie apocalypse than I ever will.  Keep in mind I definitely recommend making an impenetrable makeup shield with your setting powder of choice and this setting spray!  I hope your highlighter is blinding and your gloss is glossing 💋

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every time I wear makeup. If I forget to put it on, it seems like my makeup creases more.
This product is amazing - it sets everything in place, creates a seamless look and prevents makeup from getting into any fine lines and wrinkles. I love the vibrancy it adds too!
This is by far my favourite setting spray. I love using this as it keeps my makeup in place all day and night, no matter what I'm doing. Definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely the spray you need to take with you whenever you go ! I put it to the test for more then 12 hr and it worked ! I’m definitely going to invest in this setting spray !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive the Urban Decay All Nighter spray !! I have been wanting to try it for ages and it did not disappoint ! This spray is everything, I would definitely buy it again ! Your make up stays in place the full day it's insane ! LOVE IT !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tested this product by using it during a very very warm day. I even dipped my head in the pool multiple times and the makeup didn't even change a bit. The whole makeup look stayed identical before and after the pool.  - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the results of this. Keeps make up on all day and night. The smell is not so great, but doesn’t last. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Even keeps blush on all dayy!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *disclamer I'm basing this review on 2 time uses* i bought it mainly to keep my makeup fresh and for it to stay. let me just say it DELIVERED. i only wear cream blush and bronzer, and sometimes light concealer or hilighter. As we know, blush is usually gone after 20 mins but it stayed trough my 8h shift AND school air 💪 only down side is it did not survive my nap on the couch. my blush what pretty much gone wich is understandable. i did wear a lill bit of eyeshadow that day and it creased so bad wich never happened before. i also did set my whole face real quit with a brush and powder to even out the spray. make SURE to shake the bottle first to avoid random drops. has a light smell, not a bad smell, not a good smell but its gone after it dries

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product so much, it makes my makeup last so long and it makes it look refreshed!! ( I also have dry skin and it kinda hides that when I use this product).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best setting spray! My make is intact all day with this! Just bought the jumbo size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this setting spray so much, it literally makes my makeup stay on throughout the whole day. it’s honestly worth buying in on sale right now for $43 since it’s 250ml and the full size is usually $48 for 118ml. such a steal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favourites. My makeup lasts for ever and does not budge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
